entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 04:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: N 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
